data.title: Phone number
data.statement: Extract the valid phone number from  sentences. The phone number must  start with 0 and contain 10 digits in total with at least 2 different digits.

testCases.title: Test 1
testCases.testIn: Hello, my phone number is 0123456789, my address is rue Voltaire 145.

testCases.title: Validator 1
testCases.testIn: Hello, my phone number is 0111122233, my address is rue Voltaire 145.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: the number 1234567890 is not valid anymore. Contact the number 0147258369 if you have any question

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: the number 1234567890 is not valid anymore. Contact the number 0111122233 if you have any question

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn: the number 012345678 is not valid anymore. Contact the number 0999999888 if you have any question

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: the number 012345677 is not valid anymore. Contact the number 0123456789 if you have any question

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn: Our customer care representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week on : 0000000000, 9999999999 and 0777778899

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: Our customer care representatives are available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week on : 0000000000 and 9999999999 and 0777779999

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Extract the valid phone number from sentences. The phone number must start with 0 and contain 10 digits in total with at least 2 different digits.
Input
String
Output
Phone number
Constraints
Example
Input
Hello, my phone number is 0123456789, my address is rue Voltaire 145.
Output
0123456789
